name: Customise wp Login page
author: Djouonang Landry

sections.description:
Customise wp Login page replaces the default wordpress login page with a custom login page.This is to help individuals who want to personalize the login page for their wordpress website and don’t want to hack the codes. This simple plugin will help you achieve that.

Key feautres

  • The Back end wordpress login page found at wp-login.php is replaced with a custom branded page.

  • You can change the backgroud image behind the login form to any image of your choice.

  • You don’t get redirected to the wordpress login page in case of wrong password or username. Your backend remains completely customised.

NB: You may encounter design issues while using this plugin due to your theme’s settings. In such a case please contact me through the support page and i will check what is the issue.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin from wordpress repo .
  2. Upload the file through the plugins tab on the wordpress dashboard
  3. After uploading you will be asked to activate the plugin.
  4. Activate the plugin and you can refresh your front page to see changes
sections.faq:
Can i make any suggestions ?

Yes.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issues.

Can i change background image of login page too?

Yes you can do that from Appearance screen.
sections.changelog:
1.0

This is the first version of this plugin
